EmailTemplate.description: Push email sent to Market Company user if 15 days after the estimated delivery date the Experience monitoring checklist is not completed.
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience Email notify to the cellar master Client has received parcel
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Experience {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name} is successfully over
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Herv√©,
The Experience {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name} has been successfully completed! The bottles have been perfectly delivered. Please feel free to write an email to {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName}.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
